U.S. military says it conducted strikes against two unmanned aerial vehicles in YemenThe U.S. military said on Wednesday that it carried out strikes against two unmanned aerial vehicles in a Houthi-controlled area of Yemen that "presented an imminent threat to merchant vessels and U.S. Navy ships in the region." Thu, 07 Mar 2024 01:53:38 GMT WZU6WX4FMZPIXLN4IRKZOXVN7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-military-says-it-conducted-strikes-against-two-unmanned-aerial-vehicles-yemen-2024-03-07/Reuters世界中东地区
China steps up grey-zone warfare to exhaust Taiwan, defence report saysChina has stepped up grey-zone warfare against Taiwan, aiming to make the areas around the democratic island "saturated" with balloons, drones and civilian boats, a Taiwan defence ministry report said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 01:40:24 GMT 6ODBCRVXMVN3HOFQSRGHUZ57SI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-steps-up-gray-zone-warfare-exhaust-taiwan-defence-report-says-2024-03-07/Yimou Lee世界中国
More Chinese women choosing singledom as economy stuttersFreelance copywriter Chai Wanrou thinks marriage is an unfair institution. Like many young women in China, she is part of a growing movement that envisions a future with no husband and no children, presenting the government with a challenge it could do without. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 01:10:32 GMT DWIYTGTRRVIS3FJMZUFNBDIUAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/more-chinese-women-choosing-singledom-economy-stutters-2024-03-07/Laurie Chen世界中国
Australia and Vietnam upgrade relations, to begin talks on critical mineralsAustralian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Thursday the country was elevating ties with Vietnam to a comprehensive strategic partnership, opening an annual dialogue on critical minerals amid a push to diversify supply chains away from China. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 01:06:48 GMT BU3H2AVDMZJHLIY6BHLQ4JD6YU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-upgrades-relations-with-vietnam-strategic-partnership-2024-03-07/Alasdair Pal世界亚太地区
Brazil prosecutors say blasting at Paranagua port should be halted pending death probeFederal prosecutors in Brazil have recommended that the country's environment agency Ibama suspend blasting work in the bay of Paranagua port pending an investigation into the death of a diver, according to a statement on Wednesday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 00:34:29 GMT HW7IH6BYNRNFLL5WHJTME2CCWM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-prosecutors-say-blasting-paranagua-port-should-be-halted-pending-death-2024-03-07/Ana Mano世界美洲
UK's Cameron heads to Germany for talks on Ukraine, GazaBritish foreign minister David Cameron will discuss boosting support for Ukraine and efforts to get more humanitarian aid into Gaza in talks with his German counterpart Annalena Baerbock in Berlin on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 00:10:06 GMT DUPAPJBR2ZK2TKSMM2X6JWFMUY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/uks-cameroon-heads-germany-talks-ukraine-gaza-2024-03-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Junta-led Sahel states to form joint force to fight insurgentsJunta-led Niger, Burkina Faso, and Mali have agreed to set up a joint force to tackle security threats across their territories, Niger's armed forces chief Moussa Salaou Barmou said on Wednesday after a meeting with his counterparts. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 00:05:59 GMT B7S2RBAU7RPALFRN4DBFGGXJO4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/junta-led-sahel-states-form-joint-force-fight-insurgents-2024-03-07/Reuters世界非洲
Leader of restive Moldova region tells Putin local rights being crushedThe pro-Russian leader of Moldova's restive Gagauzia region told Kremlin leader Vladimir Putin on Wednesday that the country's central authorities were systematically crushing her region's political and economic rights. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 23:00:51 GMT W7LPOYFPKJMCBJ7N4AO4I73ULY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/leader-restive-moldova-region-tells-putin-local-rights-being-crushed-2024-03-06/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
UN Security Council considering call for Ramadan truce in SudanThe United Nations Security Council is considering calling for an immediate cessation of hostilities ahead of Ramadan in the nearly year-long war between the Sudanese army and paramilitary Rapid Support Forces, diplomats said. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:44:09 GMT CV656BSWCVOURDVBDRJJI7MKUA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/un-security-council-considering-call-ramadan-truce-sudan-2024-03-06/Michelle Nichols世界非洲
UN to test Israeli military road to get aid to Gaza's northThe United Nations will assess on Thursday how it can use an Israeli military road bordering the Gaza Strip to deliver aid to hundreds of thousands of desperate civilians in the north of the Palestinian enclave, a senior U.N. aid official said. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:42:18 GMT EAPB5TW73NNLZHCMNZTE3PB7C4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/untest-israeli-military-road-get-aid-gaza-north-2024-03-06/Michelle Nichols世界中东地区
North Korea leader Kim Jong Un orders heightened war preparations, KCNA saysNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un inspected field training of troops at a major military operations base in the western region of the country on Wednesday and ordered heightened readiness for war, state KCNA news agency reported on Thursday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:05:32 GMT S5B52WGMOVOIFFQJYA4EZSQ27Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korean-leader-kim-jong-un-orders-heightened-war-preparations-kcna-says-2024-03-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
